scenes.summary: Alice notices the White Rabbit checking a watch and rushes after it, just in time to see it disappear down a rabbit-hole, into which she immediately follows.
Alice falls slowly down the deep well, passing cupboards, shelves, maps, and jars as she muses aloud and grows sleepy during the endless descent.

In the lamp-lit hall, Alice discovers the tiny golden key and opens the small door to glimpse a beautiful garden, then drinks from the bottle labeled “DRINK ME” and shrinks too small to reach the key again.
